pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, May 4, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, May 4, 2017:

Montréal, Quebec

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Irish Taoiseach (Prime Minister), Enda Kenny.

Plaza Centre-Ville
Versailles Room, Floor C1
777 Boulevard Robert-Bourassa
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Cameras and photographers should arrive no later than 10:30 a.m.

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a luncheon at the Chamber of Commerce of Metropolitan Montreal with the Irish Taoiseach (Prime Minister).

Plaza Centre-Ville
Regency Room, Floor C
777 Boulevard Robert-Bourassa
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media

  • Open coverage of remarks
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:30 a.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the Irish Taoiseach (Prime Minister).

Plaza Centre-Ville
777 Boulevard Robert-Bourassa
Cartier B Room, Floor C
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:30 a.m.

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Montréal, Denis Coderre.

Plaza Centre-Ville
Versailles Room, Floor C1
777 Boulevard Robert-Bourassa
Montréal, Quebec

Note for media

  • Photo opportunity only

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a meeting of the Prime Minister’s Youth Council.         

Closed to media.


Media Appearances

An interview with the Prime Minister will air on RTE Radio One's "Morning Ireland" program between 7:00 and 9:00 AM (Irish local time). The interview will also air on the RTE Lunchtime News at 1:00 PM and on the RTE Six One News at 6:00 PM (both Irish local time).
